law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1605, effective July 15, 2010; and ch. 48, sec. 8, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 358, sec. 26, effective July 15, 1994.
